channel.title: Services on The kitty zone
channel.description: Read the latest Services on The kitty zone

item.title: Librarian
item.description: Sick of YouTube but hate Odyssee, well with Librarian you can use Lbry tracking free. Librarian is a privacy focused frontend for Odyssee aka Lbry. As always nothing gets logged except that someone accessed the service.
item.content:encoded:
Sick of YouTube but hate Odyssee, well with Librarian you can use Lbry tracking free. Librarian is a privacy focused frontend for Odyssee aka Lbry.

As always nothing gets logged except that someone accessed the service.

item.title: Libreddit
item.description: Perhaps you wanna reddit the kitty zone, Libreddit is privacy focused frontend for reddit. Unlike teddit it has a newer feeling interfaces and is written in Rust. It use dark theme by default and uses hls for videos meaning they are proxied thorugh my servers. NFSW is also visible by default. As always nothing gets logged except that someone accessed the service.
item.content:encoded:
Perhaps you wanna reddit the kitty zone, Libreddit is privacy focused frontend for reddit. Unlike teddit it has a newer feeling interfaces and is written in Rust.
It use dark theme by default and uses hls for videos meaning they are proxied thorugh my servers.
NFSW is also visible by default.

As always nothing gets logged except that someone accessed the service.

item.title: My PIVX Wallet
item.description: A portable wallet for the PIVX currency. Why? Well diversity in the instances of MyPIVXWallet is great right? Right
item.content:encoded:
A portable wallet for the PIVX currency.

item.title: ProxiTok
item.description: Sick of people sending you TikTok links? ProxiTok is a privacy focused frontend for TikTok making it easy to view a video without being tracked but we all know answering the person with “Mhh yeah” is the right call. As always nothing gets logged except that someone accessed the service.
item.content:encoded:

item.title: Search the kitty zone
item.description: Search the kitty zone, powered by Searx. Configured with relativ speed in mind while also giving accurate results and autocomplete turned on by default. POST is used as opossed to GET for improved privacy. As always nothing gets logged except that someone accessed the service.
item.content:encoded:
Search the kitty zone, powered by Searx.
Configured with relativ speed in mind while also giving accurate results and autocomplete turned on by default.
POST is used as opossed to GET for improved privacy.

As always nothing gets logged except that someone accessed the service.
